Title: toRelativeWeekNum
Description: Converts a date, or date with time, to the number of weeks elapsed since a certain fixed point in the past.
date — Date or date with time. Date/DateTime/DateTime64.
The number of weeks from a fixed reference point in the past. UInt32.
Examples: SELECT  toRelativeWeekNum(toDate('2000-02-29')) AS w1,  toRelativeWeekNum(toDate('2001-01-12')) AS w2
